input.sentences: there was a rocket making camp and the kids | both young and older loved it .
they got to `` blast off '' these rockets into the sky .
they came back down with parachutes .
such a great turnout for this first time event .
check out this remote controlled rocket blasting off .
output.sentences: Rockets are always loved by kids.
The kids watch the rockets blast into the sky.
The best part is when the rocket opens it's parachute.
There was a great turnout for this event.
The kids ended the day with an opportunity to fly a remote controlled rocket.
